website_summaries.verdict: While it delivers nice results for a lot of consumers, those who are novices to eyebrow dye may want to consider other kits we reviewed.
pros: Often used in salons, RefectoCil has a 3% oxidant that develops rich, true color for most users
Kit includes well-made application brush and glass mixing dish
cons: Not all hair types/colors get the same results, requiring the need for more frequent applications for some

customer_reviews.title: My go to from now on
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! Very easy to use and it works just like expected. I purchased the natural brown 3 and it looks very natural a little darker but I know it will fade to a lighter brown since I did test the color on my wrist a couple days ago. I’m not sure how long it will last on my eyebrows but I will update later. I mixed equal parts of color and developer in a little mixing cup, I used an old Anastasia brow brush I had to apply the product and it worked great. I let the product dry for about 10 minutes on each eyebrow then wiped it off with a damp towel.
customer_reviews.author: M. M

customer_reviews.title: DO TEST PATCHES BEFORE USE. I don't have any ...
customer_reviews.text: DO TEST PATCHES BEFORE USE. I don't have any problems using the Godefroy brand. But with this brand it have my eyebrows an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is a carcinogen !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be completely honest, I didn’t get past the patch test before completely reading the tube containing the dye. It states directly on the tube that it is tested on lab animals, and that these animals developed cancer related to this product. It doesn’t even sugar coat it, it literally says this product is a carcinogen. Why would I ever risk getting cancer for something like this. No where is that mentioned on the amazon page. I’m very upset. This was a complete waste of money. I won’t be trying and I sincerely hope anyone reading this doesn’t either. It may have great results but they’re not worth it. Please look for a safer option.
customer_reviews.author: Carley Yanko

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this product to recreate what used to be dark brown thick-ish eyebrows that have grown thinner and whiter. As another reviewer wrote, you should definitely do a test first, especially if you have sensitive skin. What works for me is to carefully apply vaseline around my eyebrows and then color in 2-minute intervals, or 2 minutes, then 1 minute at a time. I wipe off both the vaseline and extra color with make-up wipes, and if any stray color remains, scrub very gently around each eyebrow. While it's a neat and fast little system, be sure to protect the area--sink or vanity--and quickly look for and clean up any tiny splashes of dye.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J

customer_reviews.title: Causes cancer and tests on animals
customer_reviews.text: Please don't buy this. First of all, they test on animals. Secondly, the animals they did test on got cancer. Yet somehow amazon is still legally selling this product. If you own this product read the label, it is all right there. If you used this product and now have melanoma I would be contacting a lawyer.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tinting eyebrows/lashes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tinting eyebrows/lashes. As a makeup artist I get just the results my client wants. It's versatile in shade, can be light brown for fair skin or dark brown for darker skin depending on time left on the hair. It burns terribly if it gets in the eyes, but I haven't discovered a dye that doesn't when tinting eyelashes. I use eye-makeup remover when removing it so my client doesn't have tinted skin; shade is not comprised with eye-makeup remover either.
customer_reviews.author: JA&KA

customer_reviews.title: Great product and color
customer_reviews.text: I’m a warm blonde and was glad I ordered Medium brown to get coverage on brows and carefully used on lash tips too. Lasts at least a week and is so easy to and quick to reapply. I did my husband’s brows and covered the grays, which impressed him. Much cheaper than going to my esthetician’s salon every month, except she does brow wax too....worth a try and seems plenty of product in package to last months.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W

customer_reviews.title: Animals tests and causes cancer & blindness!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT!! Honestly I was super impressed at first. I wiped it off and loved the brow hair color and tint on the skin. Then after about 4 hours the color oxidized and turned Auburn red color and is gross now. AND more importantly, of you read the tube, it’s says NOT to use on brows. Beards only. Because it can cause blindness. AND even more importantly it states on the tube that it has an ingredient that has been determined to cause cancer in Lab test animals. There’s a special place in hell for companies this unethical..
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Saves me money!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been having my eyebrows tinted professionally for years! It was costing me $20 plus tip plus a drive to the salon every 3 weeks. I have very blonde eyebrows and strawberry blonde hair and the natural brown tint works great on me. I took the advice of another person who reviewed this product and lined the outside of my eyebrow with chapstick on a Q-tip. The first time I used the tint, I only left it on for 3 minutes and then touched up places that didn't take the tint as well. It works beautifully and it is saving me so much money and time!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara R.

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this product. I'm an esthetician and refectocil is my favorite brand of brow tint. Its really easy to use, the colors are great, and it mixes smooth for the perfect consistency. When I opened my package however I was very disappointed! They sent me light brown which is for blondes when I ordered natural brown. I have very dark hair and only natural brown will do. Soo bummed! Off it goes back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: harmony rose

customer_reviews.title: Great kit to dye eyebrows at home on own!
customer_reviews.text: I need to have my eyebrows dyed and just have a hard time to find someone that can do them. They've bleached from the Summer and I am debating on having them tattooed on so decided to try this. So glad that I did. This natural brown is dark. My hair color is dark so it works for me just fine although it was darker than I thought it would be. I left on for 5 minutes and they were immediately dark with no irritation to the skin. It doesn't take much product so this will prob be a lifetime supply. Great product. Am on day 10 of use and no fade of color. Very jappy
customer_reviews.author: lecker

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife, who has used it twice. The results have been great! The product is easy to use and best results last about 2 weeks (at 3 weeks the brows start to need light touch-up with brow pencil). Unlike with other products, the Groucho Marx phase lasts less than a day, then tones down to a nice dark-to-medium brown. She likes that it colors her gray brow hairs since most of her new growth is that color. She would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Carrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Actually best eyebrow tint I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was so scared after reading all the awful review about allergic reactions that people had to this....I have very sensitive skin and nothing bad happened at all. I am actually very impressed with the product - I'm a natural redhead=color doesn't take easily... It colored even the tiniest think hairs! +the color on the skin washeD off very quickly and easily. *note: if you have a lighter completion and are going for a natural look, maybe look at lighter colours (this one looks a little black on me - but still good).
customer_reviews.author: Sofiya Vozyakova

customer_reviews.title: am i doing it wrong?
customer_reviews.text: I followed the exact directions from the package...but its just too watery? Then another time I tried adding less of the developer but meh. I am actually looking for one that stains my skin a bit more to make it look like I have eyebrows and this really only gets the hairs. Which is good if you have a lot of hairs I guess. It also doesnt last super long. I was hoping for more than like 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: A. Dermer

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of two young kiddos, I rarely have time to do my make up and I’m a believer that eyebrows matter! This makes a huge difference on my nude face! I love it so much! I used it every 6 weeks or so and it makes such a huge difference
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: I love that it came with a little dish and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I ordered dye for my eyebrows. I figured for the price it was worth a shot. I love that it came with a little dish and the brush. It was super easy to use and my brows look perfect! There is plenty of dye here so this will last a while. I left mine on for 6 minutes and it was dark enough for me ( i have light brown hair). I am sure if you leave it on longer you could get a deeper dark brown color.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Oops
customer_reviews.text: I found this product on a site for dying eyebrows. I didn’t realize the instructions said NOT for eyelashes or eyebrows. That being said, I took the risk anyway and was very pleased with the results. I caution everyone to follow the manufacturer’s directions.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wasserstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!!! The color is perfect! If you need to go darker I would, but it is perfect for light/medium brown. I did one application and kept it on for a good 30 minutes. It did start to tingle at the end (which was weird?) but I just removed and it was fine:) I attached a photo for your review! Also shipping was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great color match
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow tint /color is amazing to my surprise and being a brunette it’s a perfect match ... not reddish brown as some others tend to get . The longer you leave on the darker .i left on about 5 minutes and used the kit , brush and glass dish. Brush Helped to get eyebrows without getting color on rest of skin so I had no dark shadow as others mentioned .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have lighter brown hair with a red tone to it, fair skin and freckles and my eyebrows are blonde. The natural brown was dark enough and looks natural and I didn't need to add any additional makeup to fill in areas that didn't color dark enough. Uniform color, natural looking and easy to use. I also used the Tweezerman color stain remover so no dye was left on my skin. Highly recommend both those products, use together for best effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That is not for eyebrows and eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I don't understand something, but "this product must not e used for dyeing the eyelashes and eyebrows. to do so may cause blindness". Look at the photo. This is the information from package.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a life saver. I have very light brows even tho I have dark brown hair. I hated having to fill in my brows every morning. This stuff is amazing!!! I apply it 2 times a week & my brows look amazing & natural & full!!! It says it can last up to 2 weeks, but it doesn’t last that long for me at all. I have oily skin tho so that could be why. But this is so much better than filling in my brows every day. Saves me so much time!! And no worrying about my brows coming off throughout the day 😂 DONT HESITATE. GET THIS
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have used
customer_reviews.text: - lovely dark, chocolatey brows (I applied twice and left on for 5 minutes each time) - quick to use - little mess - kit comes with everything you need - professional product - consider using petroleum jelly around the edge of your brows to prevent staining your skin, however dyed skin can be lightly scrubbed clean
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Binns

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to tint your eyebrows at home!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend who is a cosmetologist. She said they use this brand in her salon. This kit contains everything you need to tint your eyebrows at home! It has the tint (with mixing stick in the box), developer, mini mixing bowl and an applicator brush. The included instructions were easy to follow. I will definitely be purchasing this product again!
customer_reviews.author: nutmegnina

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product has a little learning curve for application but it does the trick. Darkening my brows makes a DRAMATIC, positive difference. TIP: the packaging may be in a different language but you can easily find English directions on their website.
customer_reviews.author: shilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great but TEST first!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying I am a licensed esthetician. The kit and everything in it were super easy to use. You need a very small amount of product to tint an area such as brows thoroughly. With that being said, please please please be sure to patch test. I did not as I’ve tinted before and I do not have sensitive skin. However, upon almost immediately application it started to tingle and then full on burn. Unfortunately,I had to return it because of this so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: I used to use Just for Men beard coloring and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Just for Men beard coloring and recently they changed the product and I started breaking out. This has been my replacement. This is easier to use than JMB and it lasts longer and colors more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dodge

customer_reviews.title: and they look better than they have in years
customer_reviews.text: I don't often leave reviews, but I bought this kit and am totally impressed. Unfortunately, with age my eyebrows have gotten very light, gray, skimpy. I used to have such full brows, and never over plucked them, but whatever. My brows have bothered me for several years, and I tried tints, gels, pencils, but it wasn't what I was looking for. I got this product, and wow. The non existent patches suddenly had a normal color! I left on for about 8 or 9 minutes, and my brows came back to life. Now I just fill in with a bit of powder, and they look better than they have in years. So grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works really good, get alot of compliments from girls. I usually leave it on for 30 minutes do some cleaning, fold laundry ect. And then just wipe it off Gently with water. Its easier if you apply Vaseline to the areas where you don't want to get stained. I saw a YouTube video and it helped me alot. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Arbey

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I will definitely purchase again! Works great on my brows and I even used it for my boyfriends goatee and it came out great! You end up with a completely natural look and I love having the control over where I can put the product. Last time I PAID to get my eyebrows tinted I ended up looking like Milhouse because the girl drew a ridiculous shape, last straw on actually paying someone to touch my eyebrows, I spent 3 days scrubbing with alcohol. This product is easy to use and pays for itself. Not to mention it comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Perelka

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit - the "Natural Brown" can get pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice little kit - the "Natural Brown" can get pretty dark if you don't keep a close eye on it. Pay lots of attention to that 5 minute developing time! Good product and easy to use. The Refectocil developer is great to have, works better/is easier than using hydrogen peroxide in my opinion. Worth the price and it seems like it will last forever since you use so little at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Raena Colby

customer_reviews.title: excelent product
customer_reviews.text: color is great, does the job super well. Just careful when washing the tools - the dye is so good that it stained my Blanco Silgranit kitchen sink. From now I will be washing my tools only in porcelain sinks. Strong stuff - holds the color very well.
customer_reviews.author: Comodified

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty nice but I definitely got an allergic reaction to this. I tried it first on my forearm and didn’t get a reaction but my eyebrows were covered in red blisters within 2 days of doing this at home. I only left it on for 10 minutes. Pretty bummed bc it looked good before the gross red pustuals.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra M

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts for 1-2 days
customer_reviews.text: doesn't last as long as it should. and you have to let it sit wayyyy longer than 10-15 minutes to actually work
customer_reviews.author: yana

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy!! Very happy with the results!
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid to try this but I’m SOOO happy I did!! I got natural brown and it’s a little darker than I thought but I still really like it. I left on my brows for about 10 minutes and they turned out great! I will do my own brow tinting from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Darrah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used a pea sized amount of the tube and then 3 drops of the developer. I left it on for about 8 minutes. I have no complaints, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ♊

customer_reviews.title: Best tint yet
customer_reviews.text: Works better than any other eyebrow tint I've tried thus far. Color stays for about 2 weeks, and perhaps a little longer, but after that 2 week mark I have to start lightly filling in with a pencil again. It doesn't stain the skin too badly either, but if you want to avoid that altogether, put some Vaseline on the skin around your eyebrows before you apply the color - it won't stain at all!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great for people with blonde hair that have to dye ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for people with blonde hair that have to dye their eyebrows often because of fading. It gives a very strong color and lasts for 2 weeks without fade given I wash my face twice a day with strong acne cleansers.
customer_reviews.author: carlee

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I applied it to my brows and lashes. Be careful not to touch the base of your lashes cos it will sting your eyes. Otherwise Natural Brown is a good colour for me and it's very natural LOL.... I meant to say, it doesn't look tattooed or painted.
customer_reviews.author: Serene

customer_reviews.title: Great product, perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread! I received the product today and couldn't wait to try it. I have thin eyebrows and have been filling them in with an eyebrow pencil since I was a teenager. The product was easy to apply and worked like magic. I have eyebrows! The natural brown was the perfect color for me. It looks a little red when you first put it on but the results are like a taupe. I have medium brown hair so this was perfect. I will update once I have a chance to see how long it takes to wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dye
customer_reviews.text: I use this to dye my brows. Will last a long time as you don't need to use very much. Can tingle a little but is pretty easy to apply and wipe off. I have really sensitive skin and have had no adverse reactions. Leaves a nice natural brown, not too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin eyebrows so I was so excited that there was an easy product I could try at home. It is extremely easy to apply and worked wonderfully! It's very natural and makes my eyebrows look much fuller. I am 100% satisfied with this amazing product. I do not know how long it will last but I will update this review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Isa Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Misleading! NOT SUITED FOR EYEBROWS
customer_reviews.text: The picture in description shows the eyebrows and eyelashes tint (“Augenbrauen”, eyebrows in German”) which I used before and worked perfectly fine for me. The one I got is for the beard and who knows what else for, but as you can see in the picture I submitted it clearly says “MUST NOT BE USED FOR DYEING THE EYELASHES AND EYEBROWS; TO DO SO MAY CAUSE BLINDNESS”
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: oxydant
customer_reviews.text: I received this product months ago although I did not open it since my eyebrows had been recently done by an eyebrow person. I just recently went to apply it and I realized that the Oxydant was missing. I have been unable to color my eyebrows since I need that ingredient that never came with the original order. Please send that to me I will pay the charge. Thank you. Ines Leyva - 1192 SW 143rd. Place, Miami, Fl. 33184 - I placed order on 8/3/18
customer_reviews.author: Ines Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Directions said leave it on for 5-10 minutes, left it on for 8 and they were a bit too dark.
customer_reviews.text: The directions said leave it on for 5-10 minutes. I left it on for 8 minutes and my already brown eyebrows were too dark. It faded nicely though. I would recommend starting off with less time and add more if it’s not the desired color from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I have eyebrows!
customer_reviews.text: I finally have eyebrows! My daughter did the whole process, so I have no actual clue how to do it, but she did it in 10 min. And, the color lasts for a long time. Yes, they look very dark the first day, but they even out after one shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrow Dye Kit
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use and dyed a large portion of the eyebrows which is the same as the hairdresser. However it made my eyebrows look black which looked really dark on me and frankly unusable. I ordered a lighter shade which is light brown and uses the other products in this kit which worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: jack potash

customer_reviews.title: Covers greys well, not messy!
customer_reviews.text: Covers greys in eyebrows very well. If I knew it was this easy I would have done a long time ago. Years ago I tried another product that was messy and mostly stained my skin, giving bad results. I will continue to do this even when hair salon open back up from the quarantine. My greys show up after 3 weeks. Highly recommend this product, I would make less of solution then recommend as I threw out a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Convenience!
customer_reviews.text: Great at home eyebrow tint! All items that you need. I did not get the brush though. I just got a little stick to mix. I’ll reach out to the seller and update when I hear back.
customer_reviews.author: ClovesJ

customer_reviews.title: Color looks good and lasts well, doesn’t mix easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a great color and lasts well. With that said, it doesn’t mix very easily and a little difficult to figure out how much developer is equal to how much color you squeeze out. So you have to guess on the mixing. I use this on my husband and that’s what I’ve been doing and it’s been turning out well.
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: My go-to for eyebrow tinting
customer_reviews.text: An excellent kit with everything you need for at-home eyebrow tinting, at a FRACTION of the cost of salon tinting, which was running me broke and was no better than this product. Doesn't irritate my skin. I once was lost and now I'm found.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Dubois

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best thing I have ever bought on Amazon. I have used it 4 times and the tube isn't even halfway gone. For the price, you get your money's worth. Easy to use, and the results are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Forgash

customer_reviews.title: Great eyebrow tint
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me! I have blonde eyebrow hair but the rest of my hair is medium/dark brown. This stuff makes my eyebrows match my hair perfectly. It does not come with instructions so I recommend looking up some "How-to" videos on youtube to learn how to use this product. Overall it was easy enough for me, a total beginner, to use. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Really permanent paint
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult for me to dose the paint and oxidizer, and at first the paint seemed too light. However, over time after application to the eyebrows, the color became more saturated and darker. The color has been holding for a whole week. I am very satisfied with the product and recommend it for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: katsiaryna lutovich

customer_reviews.title: Great eyebrow dye!
customer_reviews.text: My first time dying my brows at home - this product is really easy to use and worked great. Colour is on the dark side when you first dye them but it fades after a couple of showers and is perfect (i'm a dark blonde) and it's lasted over a month so far. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work! I want my money back!
customer_reviews.text: I have black hair, and I ordered the natural brown. After using the product, my hair color didn't change, and it got even more black! I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow dye
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Not the first time I’m using it and in my country (Israel) its way more expensive! I was sooo happy to see that Amazon sells it. Also it comes will everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ayelet Kalandarov

customer_reviews.title: Throw directly in the garbage
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional esthetician and I was looking for something to use at home and family and friends. This stuff is utter garbage.
customer_reviews.author: StephT

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I bought this at a one-time price vs. going to the salon and paying every time. So easy to use and works! I tint my own eyebrows every 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: After several trips to have brows dyed and threaded... I realized that touching up the tint is easily done at home Super easy. Glad to get it all in a "kit"
customer_reviews.author: BookLoversinFL

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, left it on for 10 minutes and it looks really good. Only thing is I’ve had it on for a week now and it faded might leave it on longer next time. Will update review next week w picture
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Stays on for like 4 days.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, I like the product because if I'm in a pinch I can just use it and not have to worry about my eyebrows, but even when I try not to wash my eyebrows when I'm washing my face, they still seem to come off after like 3-4 days and I have it on for 10 minutes before washing it off.
customer_reviews.author: klaudia skoropad

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in good condition. The glass was wrapped in bubble wrap and doesn’t have a scratch on it. The product itself is something I’ve used when I learned how to do eyelash and eyebrow tinting. A little goes a really long way. You only need but a pea size amount of the color to tint both eyelashes. Same goes for the eyebrows. Remember to always do a patch test before attempting.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Baltazar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Love! I have such blonde eyebrows and constantly have to fill them in, this stuff works great! Looks natural and the color lasts 3-4 weeks before I have to apply again. I’ve had it for a few months and I still have a lot left. I feel like this could last my a whole year. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to mix it up
customer_reviews.text: I heard a lot of positive reviews about this color refectocil, and color cream is perfect. My brows have color already 2 weeks. But liquid oxidant... it is terrible. I need to spend about 2 minutes to mix it with color cream, otherwise there will be a lot of lumps. It’s rather difficult to mix it up.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, but the color is too dark
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between the natural brown and the light brown, but a mixture of the two would be ideal for my hair and brow color. I would call this color "natural black" more than anything. I have pretty average brunette hair, maybe slightly on the darker side, but even this was slightly too dark. Regardless, I love the product and it's super easy to use, and the results last me around 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Melon

customer_reviews.title: Did not actually tint my eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I received my eyebrow tinting, I tried applied it according to the instructions, when I removed it, it did not tint my eyebrows.. I don’t know if I had a bad badge but there was no difference on my eyebrows.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for Lashes
customer_reviews.text: Works as you would expect. I used to practice as an esthetician, so I am used to tinting my own brows/lashes. I really liked the color on my eyes, but as a blonde I would say the brown had a slight orange tint for my eyebrows, so I would change the color next time for this area.
customer_reviews.author: GalVeg

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my dad's hair. It works great and looks very natural with his gray hair. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again! It works!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing. It was so easy to use & work with. I will definitely be rebuying & buying different colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie & Tyler Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. I used it on my eyebrows that are getting grey and it has lasted over a month. Use this color also if you want your eyebrows to stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Don't leave on long!
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty sensitive skin. It did tingle a little, but didn't burn and I didn't have a reaction. I did a patch test on my arm so I'd know how long to leave it on and also to make sureI wasn't allergic. I have very blonde brows and I left it on just under 3 minutes. I went ahead and got the natural brown because I assume it will fade fairly quick on me. Most things do. I will come back and update on that tho. As of now tho, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Juliann Owens

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for tinting my brows. I have dark brown hair and it matched perfectly. Definitely a good purchase. Easy to use and process time is only 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Guidice

customer_reviews.title: Great color and easy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use and gives great results. I wasn’t sure I could dye my eyebrows myself, but with this product it’s simple! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M. WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Worked perfectly on my eyebrows and barely needed any product. Will last a long time and save me a lot of time and money. My advice is to make sure you put it EXACTLY where you want your eyebrows to be darker- as if you're filling in your eyebrows normally- because it does dye your skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never get my eyebrows professionally tinted again
customer_reviews.text: This is simple, just follow the directions. I got a great result, although I wish they had more color options.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: My first time eyebrow coloring and it went just fine. Product is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My first time eyebrow coloring and it went just fine. Product is easy to use, just follow directions. I am black hair going grey/white and eyebrows were turning grey fast. In other words, disappearing. I started with medium brown because I dislike the look of REALLY dark eyebrows on a mature woman. Color is perfect for me. Will buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. Works great. I love the little glass for mixing! It arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, dye is the right color and it stays on longer than other dyes! Love it! Will be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: C Richmond

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because an influencer recommended it. The first day that I use it I didn't have any problem. But the next day I woke up to an allergic reaction to it. My eyebrow are very itchy and it's just red. It won't go away. So I wouldn't recommend this product. Plus in the photo it shows a clear mixing cup. I didn't get that with my products and there was no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Yemkidd

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but darker than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and covered my gray brows, but turned out very dark- more black/brown than brown. I am ordering in the lighter shade and meanwhile will leave my bangs long and wait for my dark brows to fade. BTW- I have salt and pepper hair, and my brows were a mix of dark brown and gray so was very surprised that the Natural Brown resulted in such a dark color. I left it on about 3-4 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: D Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Brown
customer_reviews.text: Only thing missing is instructions on how much to use of each I had to Google it. But it worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Braun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This color is the only color I use on my clients and it is durable and true to it's color.
customer_reviews.author: Celestine lipsey

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good color and works for my skin tone. The brush it comes with could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: JoelleY

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and color
customer_reviews.text: I use this to tint my eyebrows. I recommend using it for less time the first go around. Besides that this is a great product and I love how everything comes packaged together.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Young looking eyebrows once again
customer_reviews.text: I found this product by accident when looking for an eyebrow kit and all I can say is "where has this been all my life? " the 1990's were not kind to my brows and over plucking left them thin and sparse. This brow dye has given my brows the illusion of youthful fullness without always having to fill them in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: As an esthetician and someone that knows how to use this product. It works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just now used this and I love it! I dye my hair red (manic panic vampire red) and my eyebrows are like an ashy blonde light brown and it just clashes. The color of this dye is perfect. My eyebrows are the color I want and it didn't burn or smell bad at all. The kit they give you is perfect and will last quite a while. So happy I bought this. It is pretty dark though. I wouldn't use this color on light blonde eyebrows. Shipping was fast too!
customer_reviews.author: ashley d malarik

customer_reviews.title: 15mins & done :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My aunt recommended it and so happy she did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Someone buying stuff

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it
customer_reviews.text: Is super easy to use but definitely it doesn't stay longer than 2 days, don't get it
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye high dollar salon and hello DIY brows
customer_reviews.text: This kit rocks! My skimpy, scarce brows come alive with this kit. So easy to use. Only takes a smidgen to do both brows so I am sure this tube will last a very long time. Nothing frames your face and eyes like good brows. I used to spend way too much money having my brows dyed in salons and now I can do it fast (in about 10 minutes) at home and get every bit as good a look as I did in the high dollar salons.
customer_reviews.author: R.O. Binson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it is the perfect pigment color
customer_reviews.text: I lack patience and this little gem was fast and easy. Wohoo beauty quickly! I used it on my brows and lashes. Enjoy fellow sisters!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara R.  Medical Aesthetics Body Sculptor, Professional FasciaBlaster & DNA Nutritionist

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poor quality. The construction is flimsy and the elastic bands is very weak so it doesn’t stay on well. I do not feel it’s worth what I paid for it and I would return it if it were not so much trouble. Disappointed with this purchase and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jillydean

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great even on red hair, clear instructions and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bernat

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This actually worked very well! Easy, no discomfort, and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Always my go to and most trusted DIY eyebrow dye! I am a light blonde so always go with the brown dye. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying this first time I run out of it! I love this! If your looking for something to make your brows look like you colored them in or just darker in general GET THIS. It’s a life saver! If you want it darker just have it on for about 15-20 mins, 10 mins will do the trick for a tint. Just don’t leave it on for too long or it will get dark.
customer_reviews.author: lourdes

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure whether to go with the natural brown or the light brown, but the natural brown works great! My brows stand out a lot more now, and they are fuller looking. I'm happy with this product. It's super easy to use. Just add a pea size amt to the glass container, mix in 3 drops of liquid, and leave on for 2 mins. Simple as that! :)
customer_reviews.author: Trizzo

customer_reviews.title: If you’re on the fence.. do yourself a favor and get it!
customer_reviews.text: Stupid easy to do your own brows with this! Love this product. I’ve enjoyed helping friends and family with this product and would recommend it to anyone! I think the tube will last at least a year. Don’t pass it up. If your on the fence get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good set
customer_reviews.text: I love refectocil this is a great set for tinting brows and lashes
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Nordin

product_meta.title: REFECTOCIL COLOR KIT- Natural Brown Cream Hair Dye+ Liquid Oxidant 3% 3.38 oz + Mixing Brush + Mixing Dish
feature_bullets: The Refectocil Color Kit includes: Natural Brown Cream Hair Dye, Liquid Oxidant 3% (10 VOL)1.7oz, Mixing Brush and Glass Dappen Dish
All the items you need to start dying your hair ( also for beards.)
RefectoCil Products are for professional use only.
